chart.title: Paralytic polio: estimated cases by world region
chart.subtitle: Estimates of the total number of paralytic [polio](#dod:polio) cases, due to [wild poliovirus](#dod:wild-poliovirus) and [vaccine-derived polioviruses](#dod:vaccine-derived-poliovirus).
chart.citation: World Health Organization (2019; 2024); Tebbens et al. (2010)

Estimated polio cases.descriptionShort: The total estimated number of polio cases.
Estimated polio cases.descriptionProcessing: Total estimated cases are calculated from reported cases using correction factors from Tebbens et al. (2010).
Estimated polio cases.citationShort: World Health Organization (2019); World Health Organization (2024) – processed by Our World in Data
Estimated polio cases.citationLong: World Health Organization (2019); World Health Organization (2024) – processed by Our World in Data. “Estimated polio cases” [dataset]. World Health Organization, “WHO Historical Polio Dataset”; World Health Organization, “Polio Cases and Acute Flaccid Paralysis (AFP) Surveillance” [original data].
